title: Council Decision of 2 December 1999 adjusting the remuneration and allowances applicable to Europol employees
header:
COUNCIL DECISION
of 2 December 1999
adjusting the remuneration and allowances applicable to Europol employees
(1999/C 364/01)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Decision shall enter into force the day following its adoption by the Council.
